app_descript:
Yelp

Brief: Yelp serves as your mobile navigator to the world of local businesses, encapsulating the firsthand experiences of a global community. From the aroma wafting through the doors of hidden culinary gems to the hum of energy in diverse service-oriented locales, Yelp translates physical footprints into digital insights, providing real-person reviews that power informed decisions.
